name: LIVOLO
0:
”Alexa,turn on the bedroom light”
”Alexa,turn on the living room light”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
To get started, download LIVOLO app in App market,create a LIVOLO account and link your Wi-Fi connected devices in the LIVOLO App on your iOS or Android device. 

You must log into the LIVOLO App at least once to register and control your devices with the LIVOLO Skill.

To use this skill, click the "Enable" button above and then sign in with your LIVOLO account to link to your devices. You can create your LIVOLO account in the LIVOLO App.

Once you know the name of your devices,you can say the following:
"Alexa, turn on the bedroom light"
"Alexa, turn on the living room light"
